metadata.title: CVE-2014-8091 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
X.Org X Window System (aka X11 and X) X11R5 and X.Org Server (aka xserverand xorg-server) before 1.16.3, when using SUN-DES-1 (Secure RPC)authentication credentials, does not check the return value of a malloccall, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULLpointer dereference and server crash) via a crafted connection request.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-8091` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

xdmx - 2:1.15.1-0ubuntu2.4
xdmx-tools - 2:1.15.1-0ubuntu2.4
xnest - 2:1.15.1-0ubuntu2.4
xorg-server-source - 2:1.15.1-0ubuntu2.4
xserver-common - 2:1.15.1-0ubuntu2.4
xserver-xephyr - 2:1.15.1-0ubuntu2.4
xserver-xorg-core - 2:1.15.1-0ubuntu2.4
xserver-xorg-xmir - 2:1.15.1-0ubuntu2.4
xvfb - 2:1.15.1-0ubuntu2.4
No subscription required

libcuda1-304 - 304.125-0ubuntu0.0.1
nvidia-304 - 304.125-0ubuntu0.0.1
nvidia-current - 304.125-0ubuntu0.0.1
nvidia-libopencl1-304 - 304.125-0ubuntu0.0.1
nvidia-opencl-icd-304 - 304.125-0ubuntu0.0.1
No subscription required

libcuda1-304-updates - 304.125-0ubuntu0.0.1
nvidia-304-updates - 304.125-0ubuntu0.0.1
nvidia-current-updates - 304.125-0ubuntu0.0.1
nvidia-experimental-304 - 304.125-0ubuntu0.0.1
nvidia-libopencl1-304-updates - 304.125-0ubuntu0.0.1
nvidia-opencl-icd-304-updates - 304.125-0ubuntu0.0.1
No subscription required

libcuda1-331 - 331.113-0ubuntu0.0.4
nvidia-319 - 331.113-0ubuntu0.0.4
nvidia-331 - 331.113-0ubuntu0.0.4
nvidia-331-uvm - 331.113-0ubuntu0.0.4
nvidia-libopencl1-331 - 331.113-0ubuntu0.0.4
nvidia-opencl-icd-331 - 331.113-0ubuntu0.0.4
No subscription required

libcuda1-331-updates - 331.113-0ubuntu0.0.4
nvidia-319-updates - 331.113-0ubuntu0.0.4
nvidia-331-updates - 331.113-0ubuntu0.0.4
nvidia-331-updates-uvm - 331.113-0ubuntu0.0.4
nvidia-libopencl1-331-updates - 331.113-0ubuntu0.0.4
nvidia-opencl-icd-331-updates - 331.113-0ubuntu0.0.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: xorg-server package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:1.15.1-0ubuntu2.4').
nvidia-graphics-drivers-304 package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '304.125-0ubuntu0.0.1').
nvidia-graphics-drivers-304-updates package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '304.125-0ubuntu0.0.1').
nvidia-graphics-drivers-331 package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '331.113-0ubuntu0.0.4').
nvidia-graphics-drivers-331-updates package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '331.113-0ubuntu0.0.4').
